div1.p: Concerning the attack on Austin's house on the 4th.

body.div1:
[July, 1806]
Sir
If you have not given your deposition (respecting the attack Mr M Austins house) at the Mine A Burton, you will oblige me and also Mr M Austin by coming to Mr Andrews to-night or early tomorrow morning it is important that we should have abundant evidence on this subject and I trust Sir you will with pleasure give us yours.
Sunday evening
H. Austin
[addressed:] Mr. J Bryant [Bryan?]
Present
